data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Saint Lawrence a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Lawrence, Jersey
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 5,500 people living in Saint Lawrence.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 babies will be born in the next month to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in Saint Lawrence, Jersey.
data.prayer: Lord, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, train the church of Saint Lawrence, Jersey to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Saint Lawrence. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Over 46 percent of the people of Saint Lawrence are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
Spirit, teach the 330 believers in Saint Lawrence that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Saint Lawrence, Jersey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Lawrence, Jersey has a population of 5,500.

We estimate Saint Lawrence has 330 people who might know Jesus, 2,640 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,530 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
